name: A Day On The Job
description:
A DAY ON THE JOB

this game was made for the Secret Santa Jam. My giftee told me they liked strange experimental games, and that's a scene a really vibe with. And boom, now you have this!

it's kinda unfinished, but it's a game in which you run around an office, just talking to your new co-workers as the brand new janitor.

What kind of strange people will you encounter?
What will you be forced to do?
Find out, wont you?

CONTROLS

W-A-S-D to move
E to interact
yeah that's it

PLEASE READ

Like I said earlier, this current build is VERY unfinished. It was for a jam, after all. On top of that, my life got very complicated in the middle of the development process. I hope to pick it back up in the future and polish it, adding dialogue, quests, sidequests, etc.

Maybe even a world outside the office? I dunno. Just keep that in mind while you play. That being said, I hope you find some enjoyment out of it!
